Project.Brief history of your project and organi: Byte Tunneling was founded in 2020 with a mission to facilitate open scientific research by preparing and managing large-scale datasets. With a background in handling high-energy physics data, Byte Tunneling has been trying to collaborate with global research institutions to prepare and organize public data.
Project.Describe the data being stored onto File:
EOneGame, established in 2011, operates dozens of high-traffic mobile games globally, with a vast user base and continuously expanding business scale. After more than 10 years of operational accumulation, the data currently requiring storage includes but is not limited to:
1. Game Operation Data: User login logs, server interaction data, game state storage, user progress, and historical records. The daily data volume reaches terabytes, with peak levels exceeding 5TB per day.
2. User Behavior and Analytics Data: Records of player actions, device adaptation data, market feedback, and user preference analysis. The monthly storage demand exceeds 30TB and continues to grow.
3. Multimedia Resource Data: High-quality game art assets, audio files, CG animations, and video data. The total data volume has already surpassed 500TB and is expected to increase further with the release of new games.
Project.How do you plan to prepare the dataset: A partner we met at a meetup provided tools that were re-engineered using components from IPFS.
Project.How will you be distributing your data t: HTTP or FTP server, Shipping hard drives
